***********************************************************
~~~~~~~~ [REASONS TO CHOOSE INFINITIE NETWORKS] ~~~~~~~~~
***********************************************************

Our Data Center
Next-generation, state-of-the-art facility
Serious power from high capacity and redundant sources
N+1, N+2 and 2N+ power configurations
SAS 70 Type II certification
High-density Pacific Southwest Colocation
Multiple Backbone providers (Level 3, Hurricane Electric, Cogent, Global Crossing)
Energy Efficient ("GREEN") Data Center, we use motion activated lighting and
ultrasonic humidification to reduce energy costs

More about our Data Center can be found here:
http://www.infinitie.net/pages.php?cont=ourdatacenter

Our Network
Our network starts with a unique blend of Level3, Hurricane Electric, Global Crossing,
and Cogent to give you quick, stable connectivity where ever you are in the world.
Followed by full redundancy all the way from the edge to your server, meaning you never
have to worry about network downtime. We only use the highest quality Cisco products
in our network infrastructure to ensure reliability and consistency.

Our network is now fully native IPv4 and IPv6 dual stacked, which means that there is
no tunneling just a direct connection to the internet.

Our Servers
Our servers are assembled in house by certified professionals using reliable brand name
products like Intel, Supermicro, Western Digital, and Kingston.

Customer Service
Our professional and friendly support staff are available 24/7/365 to resolve all of
your issues in a timely, efficient manner. Our support staff carry an array of
certifications including but not limited to: CCNA, CCNP, CCSP, MCSE,
MCSA, A+, etc.

Commitment to customer satisfaction
We will strive to keep our customers satisfied with the services we provide. Our
commitment to continually add new products as hosting technologies evolve without
compromising our quality of service is at the forefront of our mission. Our commitment
focuses on quality of service, reliability, and support.

Focus on quality of product and service
Infinitie provides scalable Internet hosting solutions for organizations large and
small on a worldwide scale. Through our superior products and responsive support group.
We hope to continuously grow our client base as a reward for our quality of service,
reliability, and superior product line.

Reliability
With our superior network and server technologies, we hope to exceed all expectations
of our customers and terms of quality of service, product line, and support services.

Our commitment to reliability will be evident from the technology in which we invest;
as the saying goes, a network is only as good as the foundation it is built on.
